attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i went up there and it IMMEDIATELY crashed, i then turned my phone all the way off and turned it back on and it crashed AGAIN AND AGAIN AND AGAIN now i’ll NEVER get to see the orange ✨🍊😔

attributes.title: Terrible app, but I fwu for trying❤️🤩💫💅🏾
attributes.review: This is the WORST app EVER. I keep seeing and orange toaster named “Donald” and it’s glitching non stop!!! Showing his face. Saying he’s running for President. This app MUST be fixed. Theirs no way a roach orange named gained is running for President! The app has been corrupted!

attributes.title: Doesn’t even deserve one star
attributes.review: This app is horrible absolutely everything about it is so glitchy and doesn't even work!

attributes.title: AWFUL!!!
attributes.review: If i could give 0 stars to our homophobic, racist, mysogynistic, child molester of a president✨, i would. but i can’t. and  if you’re ever worried about this next election, remember the simpsons have not been wrong yet🥰🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Worst App EVER
attributes.review: When I opened the app there was a jump scare of the cheeto looking president and my uncle died because of it. I think it was totally unprofessional of the app to put him there. Never buy this app!!!! And also I don’t like Donald Trump.

attributes.title: 😱 DONT DOWNLOAD 💀 SCARY!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and went to sleep with it still open and when I woke up my MOM AND SISTERS WERE GONE!!! 😭 It’s just me and my dad now. I think someone tracked my location and took them! Now who am i going to sleep with 😩😩😩😭😭😭🤬🤬

attributes.title: I dislike Trumps presidential position.
attributes.review: Honestly it’s been 4 years with him and look how everything turned out I’m not in for another 4 with this president. I want a good and reliable president not trump.

attributes.title: SCARY
attributes.review: This app is SCARY when I first opens it I saw a Old wrinkly orange peel I was so scared I threw my chicken off the Empire State Building but it flew to Texas and became a cowboy but the horse kicked him off and he died a turned into a taco then Harry styles ate the taco but the chicken was still alive so now there is a chicken

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: If you want to remove almost every single teens favorite app that has kept people alive and saved people then we’ll delete yours too.

attributes.title: Bs
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but it made my phone to continuously crash and so cause my phone to crash and I had to buy a new phone 0/10 do not recommend🤷‍♀️🤷‍♀️
